name: MajorGeniePonyGirl's Another Halloween Demo
description: WOW! This is my another halloween demo. It provides you to play another halloween demo. It provides you to create more for Mushroom Kingdom Fusion The Gem Quest. There's some other stuffs for Mushroom Kingdom Fusion The Gem Quest. Give Credits to Me, sonicmaniamaster99, GoombaDave and Dave the Echidna.
